modName: FR and ENG - Lys Shield of Setvi - Skyrim
summary:
This mod add a knightly Lys Shield, with a "Fleur de Lys" - in French - symbol.
This mod come in .BSA version ; in French and English.
For the stats, please look at the pictures.
Craft: at forge under steel section.
Thanks to Abakus and thanks to you.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=5]This mod add a standalone knightly Lys Shield, with a "Fleur de Lys" - in French - symbol.
[/size][/b][b][size=5][color=#f4f4f4]This mod come in [/color][color=#6d9eeb].BSA[/color][color=#f4f4f4] version ; in French and English.[/color]

[/size][/b][b][size=5]For the stats, please look at the pictures.
Craft: at forge under steel section.

[/size][/b][b][size=5]Thanks to Abakus and thanks to you.
[/size][/b][b][size=5]Sorry for the ugly Lys symbol, this is my first - public - retexture mod ever.

[/size][/b][b][size=5]No DLC or no other mods are required.
[/size][/b][b][size=5]I used the modders ressource I've found here:

[/size][/b][b][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5916/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5916/?[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/487647/?]Abakus[/url].

I'm not sure but this mod - maybe - doesn't work with any other mod who use the HeaterShield.esp or .dds textures - not tested atm.

[/size][/b][b][size=5]Since I start in a new job, I've no time to mod/update/play at Skyrim.

Thanks, Setvi.
My others mods:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2764642/?tb=mods&pUp=1]SETVI's account User Files.

[b][/b][/url][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67121/?]Aldmeri Dominion Armory of Setvi - Armurerie du Domaine Aldmeri de Setvi - Skyrim by Setvi

[/url][/b][/size][/b][b][size=5][img]http://www.clipartbest.com/cliparts/RTd/ybx/RTdybx8T9.png[/img]
[img]http://static-6.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/67990-2-1444644960.png[/img]
[img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/71788-0-1449405432.jpg[/img][/size][/b][/center]
author: Setvi
